title: ** Access Basic Auth Page
preconditions: The user has a web browser installed.
The user has access to the internet.
The user has the URL <https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth> open in the browser.
main_flow: The user navigates to the URL <https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth>.
The user checks the browser header to confirm the site is asking for sign-in.

postconditions: The user is redirected to a new page with the specified headers.

If the user inputs incorrect credentials:**
The user inputs an incorrect username or password.
